com.esri.mo2.map.img
Class BaseFeatureClassProxy

                          +--com.esri.mo2.map.img.BaseFeatureClassProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dataset, FeatureClass, GeoDataset, MapDataset, Searchable, Selectable, Table
public class BaseFeatureClassProxy
extends BaseFeatureClass

Defines a proxy for a FeatureClass that can be associated with LayerInfo in a LayerSource that communicates with a remote server. Typically this will be an ImageServer, but it is also used to define FeatureClasses associated with the ArcIMS FeatureServer.

Method Detail

setDefaultExtent

public void setDefaultExtent(Envelope extent)
Provided for an ImageLayerSource to ensure that the FeatureClassProxy has an extent, and is typically used in conjunction with an ImageLayerSource's full extent that might be provided separately from the FeatureClass' extents.

Parameters:
extent - and extent to be used if the FeatureClassProxy's extent has not been set

setExtent

public void setExtent(Envelope extent)
Provided for an ImageLayerSource's refresh() method to set the extent of a FeatureClassProxy when constructing it. Typically the properties of a FeatureClassProxy will include the extent.

Overrides:
setExtent in class BaseGeoDataset
Parameters:
extent - the new Envelope, null == ok, indicates Dataset no longer has an extent

getData

public Identifiable getData(Comparable oid)
Returns the value of its superclass method. Subclasses may optionally override this method to provide additional functionality. This method is generally unsupported for imagery and hence, feature selection is not allowed.

Specified by:
getData in interface Selectable
Overrides:
getData in class BaseFeatureClass
Returns:
the Identifiable if oid is an EmbeddedDataID, otherwise it will return null
See Also:
BaseFeatureClass.getData(java.lang.Comparable)

search

public Cursor search(QueryFilter query)
This method is generally unsupported and hence feature searching is not allowed. Subclasses may optionally override this method to provide this functionality.

Specified by:
search in interface Searchable
Overrides:
search in class BaseFeatureClass
Parameters:
query - the query filter
Returns:
an empty cursor
See Also:
BaseSpatialSearch, BaseFeatureClass.searchEnvelope(com.esri.mo2.cs.geom.Envelope, com.esri.mo2.data.feat.QueryFilter)

dispatchEvent

public void dispatchEvent(DataEvent event)
Processing of DataEvents are unsupported as they are related to retrieval of features from a remote server. Subclasses may optionally change this behaviour by setting the ProcessDataEvent property - typically this is done for FeatureClassProxy objects associated with the ArcIMS FeatureServer. DataEvents of type DataEvent.ERROR are unaffected by this blocking behaviour.

Specified by:
dispatchEvent in interface MapDataset
Overrides:
dispatchEvent in class BaseMapDataset
Parameters:
event - the DataEvent to be processed
See Also:
setProcessDataEvent(boolean)

setProcessDataEvent

protected void setProcessDataEvent(boolean b)
Enables or disables processing of DataEvents. By default, DataEvent processing is disabled as it is not normally required for subLayers of an ImageServer.

Parameters:
b - boolean value - True == enable processing of DataEvents, else False
See Also:
getProcessDataEvent()

getProcessDataEvent

public boolean getProcessDataEvent()
Returns the current status of DataEvent processing.

Returns:
true == DataEvents are being processed, false == otherwise
See Also:
setProcessDataEvent(boolean)

select

public SelectionSet select(QueryFilter query)
Searches the FeatureClass with the given query and then adds the resulting OIDs to a new SelectionSet. If the QueryFilter specifies useCache=false, then a DataSelectionSet is used, which saves further retrievals from the server.

Specified by:
select in interface Selectable
Overrides:
select in class BaseFeatureClass
Parameters:
query - the Query that defines the selection
Returns:
the corresponding SelectionSet
